name: Blondies
preparation: Place a lightly oiled Perfect Petites mold onto a Sheet Pan.
Combine flour and baking powder, and gradually mix in.
Evenly divide batter in Perfect Petites, about 1 tbsp per mold. Smooth tops.
When cool to the touch, flip mold onto pan and twist to pop out Blondies.
tips: The 4-in-1 Spice Spoon is perfect for dividing the batter in the Perfect Petites; use the back of the spoon to gently smooth the top of the batter for even baking.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Perfect Petites
summary: A versatile non-stick silicone pan that makes baking the cutest bite-sized portions easy and fun! Go beyond baking and use the Perfect Petites to make ice cubes, portion baby food and sauces, and more!
